questions.question: Which of the following programming languages is an object-oriented language developed by James Gosling at Sun Microsystems?
Which programming language was created by Guido van Rossum and emphasizes code readability?
Which of the following is a popular language for web development and often runs on the server-side?
Which programming language is primarily used for iOS and macOS app development?
What language was developed by Microsoft and is commonly used for Windows application development?
Which of the following languages is a superset of JavaScript and adds optional static typing?
Which of the following languages is commonly used for creating web page interactivity and is executed on the client-side?
Which programming language was developed by Yukihiro Matsumoto and is often used for web development?
Which of the following languages is a functional programming language, particularly popular for concurrent programming and distributed systems?
Which programming language, developed by Google, is known for its simplicity and efficient performance, often used in systems programming and server side applications?
